profile.name: NB-METS-AUDIO-1.0
profile.description: Requirements for METS.xml for submission of ContentType AUDIO to the National Library of Norway

requirements.name: Content Category
requirements.description_english: The attribute mets/@TYPE MUST be used to specify the category of the content within the package, e.g., 'Datasets', 'Websites', 'Mixes', 'Other', etc. Valid values are defined in a controlled vocabulary. The vocabulary will be updated by the DILCIS Board as additional content information specifications are introduced. For audio, the following values are used: Audio - On Tangible Medium (digital or analog): Used for audio digitized from a physical medium such as a CD, cassette, MiniDisc, or tape. Audio - Media-independent (digital): Used for born-digital audio. See the vocabulary E-ARK-CSIP-Content Category (https://github.com/DILCISBoard/E-ARK-CSIP/blob/master/schema/CSIPVocabularyContentCategory.xml). This is a specification of CSIP2 (https://earkcsip.dilcis.eu/#CSIP2).
requirements.description_norwegian: Attributtet mets/@TYPE MÅ brukes til å angi kategorien til innholdet i pakken, f.eks. 'Datasets', 'Websites', 'Mixes', 'Other', etc. Gyldige verdier er definert i et fastsatt vokabular. Vokabularet vil oppdateres av DILCIS-styret etter hvert som tilleggsspesifikasjoner for innholdsinformasjon legges til. For lyd brukes disse: Audio - On Tangible Medium (digital or analog): Brukes for lyd som digitaliseres fra et fysisk medium, som en CD, kassett, minidisc eller bånd. Audio - Media-independent (digital): Brukes for digital lyd. Se vokabular E-ARK-CSIP-Content Category (https://github.com/DILCISBoard/E-ARK-CSIP/blob/master/schema/CSIPVocabularyContentCategory.xml). Dette er en spesifisering av CSIP2 (https://earkcsip.dilcis.eu/#CSIP2).

requirements.name: Content Information Type Specification
requirements.description_english: Used to define the specifications for the type of content information applied when the package was created. Valid values are defined in a controlled vocabulary. The attribute is mandatory for METS documents at the representation level. The vocabulary will be updated by the DILCIS Board as additional content information specifications are introduced. For audio, the value OTHER is used (a term different from those included in the controlled vocabulary). See the vocabulary E-ARK-CSIP-Content Information Type (https://github.com/DILCISBoard/E-ARK-CSIP/blob/master/schema/CSIPVocabularyContentInformationType.xml). This is a specification of CSIP4 (https://earkcsip.dilcis.eu/#CSIP4).
requirements.description_norwegian: Brukes til å definere spesifikasjoner for type innholdsinformasjon som ble brukt når pakken ble opprettet. Gyldige verdier er definert i et fastsatt vokabular. Attributten er obligatorisk for METS-dokumenter på representasjonsnivå. Vokabularet vil oppdateres av DILCIS-styret etter hvert som tilleggsspesifikasjoner for innholdsinformasjon legges til. For lyd brukes OTHER (en annen term enn det som finnes i det brukte vokabularet). Se vokabular E-ARK-CSIP-Content Information Type (https://github.com/DILCISBoard/E-ARK-CSIP/blob/master/schema/CSIPVocabularyContentInformationType.xml). Dette er en spesifisering av CSIP4 (https://earkcsip.dilcis.eu/#CSIP4).

requirements.name: Other Content Information Type Specification
requirements.description_english: When mets/@csip:CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE has the value OTHER, the attribute mets/@csip:OTHERCONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE MUST specify the type of content information. OTHERCONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE for audio MUST be NB-SIP-AUDIO-PROFILE-1.0. This is a specification of CSIP5 (https://earkcsip.dilcis.eu/#CSIP5).
requirements.description_norwegian: Når mets/@csip:CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE har verdien OTHER, MÅ mets/@csip:OTHERCONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE oppgi type innholdsinformasjon. OTHERCONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE for lyd MÅ være NB-SIP-AUDIO-PROFILE-1.0. Dette er en spesifisering av CSIP5 (https://earkcsip.dilcis.eu/#CSIP5).
